items.sentence: Let's not wait for the elevator. Let's take the stairs.

I often wish I could go back and do things differently.
Tom is one of the hardest working people I've ever met.
Tom tried to make ends meet by gambling on horse races.
I don't think that it's true that Tom hates foreigners.
Don't go swimming because the undertow is strong today.
Some books were easy to understand, but others weren't.
I didn't answer all of the questions that Tom asked me.
It's quiet now, but earlier, it was very noisy in here.
I can't find the dustpan. Did you do something with it?

On average, how many cups of coffee do you drink a day?
I wasn't sleeping in class. I just zoned out for a bit.
You may eat anything as long as you don't eat too much.
Whether we win or lose, I won't have any hard feelings.
